events.name: UNLV Rebels at Fresno State Bulldogs

headlines.description: — When the game was on the line, Fresno State kept going to a familiar formula.
headlines.shortLinkText: Haener rallies No. 22 Fresno State to 38-30 win over UNLV

video.headline: Jake Haener with 26-yard TD Pass to Jalen Cropper vs. UNLV

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Jake Haener with 26-yard TD Pass to Jalen Cropper vs. UNLV) 2021/09/25 ESHEET

events.name: Middle Tennessee Blue Raiders at Charlotte 49ers

headlines.description: — Chris Reynolds punched the ball four straight times up the middle to score the insurance touchdown with a leap over the pile from the 1-yard line late in the fourth quarter...
headlines.shortLinkText: Reynolds, Charlotte hold off Middle Tennessee 42-39

events.name: Wake Forest Demon Deacons at Virginia Cavaliers

headlines.description: — Sam Hartman threw three touchdown passes and Wake Forest scored on its first seven possessions in a 37-17 victory against Virginia on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hartman, Demon Deacons easily handle Virginia, 37-17

video.headline: Touchdown! Blake Whiteheart scores vs. Virginia

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Touchdown! Blake Whiteheart scores vs. Virginia) 2021/09/24 ESHEET

headlines.shortLinkText: Syracuse kicks FG as time expires, edges Liberty, 24-21

video.headline: Syracuse tops Liberty on game-ending FG
